price: 108. Arrinkaa baa wanaagsan si ay ula yimaadaan maragga wejigiisa runta ah, ama waxay ka cabsan in dhaaraha (kale) la qaato14 dhaarahooda kaddib. Ee Alle ka cabsada (Oo dhowra xilkuu idin saaray) waxna maqla. Allena ma hanuuniyo qoloda caasiyaasha ah (madaxa adag).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتُواْ بِٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهَآ أَوۡ يَخَافُوٓاْ أَن تُرَدَّ أَيۡمَٰنُۢ بَعۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡۗ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱسۡمَعُواْۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
footnotes: 14. In la celiyo dhaarahooda waa markhaatiyada dadka aan idinla diinta ahayn, waxaa lagu celiyaa markhaatiyada dadka idiin dhow, kuwa been ku dhaartana waxaa laga goyn adduun iyo aakhiroba beentaas ay ku dhaarteen.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika adnā an yatū bil-shahādati ʿalā wajhihā aw yakhāfū an turadda aymānun baʿda aymānihim wa-ittaqū al-laha wa-is'maʿū wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-fāsiqīna
